statements: SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location, avg_daily_sales FROM stores WHERE rent_cost < 5000;
SELECT store_name, location, avg_daily_sales, rent_cost FROM stores WHERE customer_age_range='18-30';
SELECT location, avg_daily_sales FROM stores ORDER BY avg_daily_sales DESC;
SELECT store_name, avg_daily_sales, rent_cost FROM stores WHERE customer_income_range='50k-100k' ORDER BY rent_cost ASC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE avg_daily_sales > 1000 ORDER BY store_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE rent_cost < 5000 ORDER BY store_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT store_name, customer_income_range FROM stores WHERE customer_age_range = '18-30' AND location = 'New York'
SELECT store_name, location, customer_age_range FROM stores WHERE customer_income_range LIKE '%50K%' ORDER BY store_name ASC
SELECT store_id, store_name, avg_daily_sales, rent_cost FROM stores WHERE location = 'California' AND (customer_age_range = '18-30' OR customer_age_range = '31-50')
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT location_name, population FROM Locations ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT location_name, median_income, education_level FROM Locations, Demographics WHERE Locations.location_id = Demographics.location_id;
SELECT AVG(avg_age) as average_age, MAX(median_income) as highest_income FROM Demographics;
SELECT location_name, population FROM Locations WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT location_name, median_income, avg_age FROM Locations JOIN Demographics ON Locations.location_id = Demographics.location_id WHERE avg_age > 30 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT location_name, education_level, household_size FROM Locations JOIN Demographics ON Locations.location_id = Demographics.location_id WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor Degree';
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE population BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_lat, location_long FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_lat, location_long, demographic_data FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, location_long, location_lat FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations WHERE location_lat > 40.0 AND location_long < -70.0;
SELECT store_name, demographic_data FROM store_locations INNER JOIN retail_analysis ON store_locations.store_id = retail_analysis.store_id WHERE retail_analysis.analysis_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations JOIN demographic_data ON store_locations.demographic_data->>'city' = demographic_data.city WHERE demographic_data.avg_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT store_name, AVG(population) AS avg_population FROM store_locations JOIN demographic_data ON store_locations.demographic_data->>'city' = demographic_data.city GROUP BY store_name;
SELECT * FROM Stores;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_id FROM Stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Locations ORDER BY city ASC, state DESC;
SELECT store_name, location_name, city, state FROM Stores INNER JOIN Locations ON Stores.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT analysis_date, COUNT(*) AS total_analytics FROM StoreAnalytics GROUP BY analysis_date;
SELECT * FROM Stores;
SELECT store_name, location_id FROM Stores WHERE store_id=1;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_name, city, state FROM Stores JOIN Locations ON Stores.location_id = Locations.location_id;

SELECT store_id, location_name, age_group, income_level, analysis_date FROM Stores JOIN StoreAnalytics ON Stores.store_id = StoreAnalytics.store_id JOIN Demographics ON StoreAnalytics.demographic_id = Demographics.demographic_id JOIN Locations ON StoreAnalytics.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT store_name, city, income_level FROM Stores JOIN Locations ON Stores.location_id = Locations.location_id JOIN Demographics ON Stores.demographic_id = Demographics.demographic_id WHERE income_level = 'High';
SELECT store_name, location_point FROM StoreLocations;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, distance FROM CompetitionData ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT store_id, trend_type, trend_value FROM MarketTrends WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount), MAX(customer_traffic) FROM StorePerformance;
SELECT store_name, location_point FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, distance FROM CompetitionData WHERE store_id = 3;
SELECT trend_type, trend_value FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT store_id, sales_amount, satisfaction_score FROM StorePerformance WHERE customer_traffic < 500;
